DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Tissue Segment Not Collected Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An explanation different than the one(s) previously specified as to why sufficient malignant neoplasm tissue was not collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tumor sample, or entire tumor that is removed for microscopic examination._Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor sample, or entire tumor that is removed for microscopic examination.:Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Concepts.definition: Tissue sample that contains an abnormal cellular infiltrate forming a solid mass. The abnormal cellular component can be benign or malignant. Tumor samples are obtained for microscopic examination and/or molecular analysis.

Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The act of gathering something together.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
